verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When we walk with the Lord in the light of His Word, What a glory He sheds on our way! While we do His good will, He abides with us still, And with all who will trust and obey.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Trust and obey, for there’s no other way To be happy in Jesus, but to trust and obey.{/lang-eng}
